name: Commander Babes
description:
Our story begins with Jun, and his childhood friend Yui, cleaning the dean's office as punishment for Yui's latest prank. Of course, if nothing went wrong this would be a pretty bland story which leads to Yui knocking over a pretty old and expensive looking vase and from it emerge two Sengoku Era generals but... they're hot babes?! The ever-reliable Yui bolts as soon as the vase shatters leaving our protagonist, Jun, responsible for helping Uesugi Kenshin and Takeda Shingen adapt to modern Japan. Experience a wild ride alongside Jun and the commander babes as they unravel the secrets of modern mathematics, the English language, and the art of babymaking!

  • 15 intimate scenes with Shingen and Kenshin as Jun helps them experience the joy of being a woman.
  • Includes all original Japanese voice-overs for all the dialogue.
  • HD upscaled images with 16:9 and 4:3 variants.
  • Gallery and Scene selections

Commander Babes is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn/Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.
